alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Training shower will impact portions of central Nassau and north central Duval Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower near Nassau Village-Ratliff, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving south at 10 mph. Affected area has received about 0.5 to 1.5 inches of rainfall. Shower could bring another 0.5 inch of rainfall. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Ratliff and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
